name: ThkGasAlmaz
description:
INFO FOR GENERAL USERS:

It is a small horror-funny game. There is a main villain "Almaz" and you should try to survive and do whatever ever game asks you to do. If you like weird indie games for one-time play, this may be the thing you should try. The game style more feels like "Grany". PLEASE PLAY NORMAL MODE FOR THE FIRST TIME. It is the most bugless mode.

INFO FOR MORE INTERESTED USERS:

Ok so this game is my first game and I created it alone, for your understanding I had skills just to create 2D platformer games, so the fact that I finished(kinda) a 3D game which has ultimate hard mechanics(for me I mean) is an incredible feeling. 

Inspiration: The main villain in this game is my friend Almaz. He is a gamer like me and we play character-based online shooters, and in most of the games, his chargers were nerfed so many times by developers. He was talking about it all day and night, so one day I told him that "Dude, I will literally make a game where you chase a player and annoy him with your complains". So as you can understand jokes became reality. There are tons of references to other games such as APEX LEGENDS, VALORANT, and ROCKET LEAGUE. So if you have played these games you should find it interested to play ThkGasAlmaz. I hope I will not go to jail for using references from other games mentioned before. Just in case: "ALL COINCIDENCES ARE RANDOM AND EVERYTHING SAID IS SARCASM.". So guys have fun playing my game, hope you will like it, expect so many bugs and problems, good luck)))
